name: Frontpoint
0:
”Alexa, tell Front Point to turn on the lights”
”Alexa, tell Front Point to run sleep scene”
”Alexa, tell Front Point to arm stay”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: front point
des:
Ready for bed and forgot to arm your system? Ask Frontpoint to arm stay the security system. Don't want to get up from the middle of a movie but you're not sure if you locked the front door? Ask Frontpoint to lock the front door. A little hot or too cold, ask Frontpoint to set the living room to heat or AC mode. Whatever the scenario, the Frontpoint skill adds convenience to monitoring and controlling your system.

Here are a few examples of other commands (start with "Alexa, ask Frontpoint..."): 

Scenes
“…Sleep.”
“…run Sleep scene.”

Security
"...is my security system (dis)armed?" 
"...to arm stay my security system."
“…to disarm.”

Access
"...is the front door unlocked?"
"...unlock the front door." 

Thermostat
"...what is the temperature? 
"...to set the living room to AC mode."
"...to set the kitchen thermostat to 72 degrees."

Lights
"...to turn the kitchen light on."
"...to set the living room light to 20%."
"...to turn off the lights."

Video Monitoring
"...to record a clip with the living room camera."
"...to pan the living room camera to the couch."

Is the skill having trouble picking up some of your devices? Try changing the name of your equipment to something more common or check your equipment name for spelling errors.

Before using this skill, you will need your Frontpoint username and password to link your Frontpoint account with Alexa. Please note that the Frontpoint skill only works for customers who have integrated systems powered by Alarm.com.
